bill_title: require the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to receive the approval of the Legislature before acquiring certain land.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require the Department of Game, Fish and Parks to receive the approval of the Legislature before acquiring certain land. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 41-2-19 be amended to read as follows: 41-2-19. The Department of Game, Fish and Parks shall have the power may , on behalf and in the name of the state, to acquire public or private property by gift, grant, devise, purchase, lease, or condemnation proceedings, and to manage, control, and improve the same property for the purpose of exercising the powers granted in this title. However, the department may not purchase any tract of land of more than forty acres without prior specific approval of the Legislature. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
